title: Extreme Insects
description: Students will enjoy reading about some of the many ways that extreme insects protect themselves in this descriptive, informational book. As they learn about insect attributes, such as size, color, and weaponry, students will discover how insects can keep from becoming food themselves.
meta: caterpillar, extreme, poison, protect, traits, weapons
Use the reading strategy of summarizing to understand and remember information in nonfiction text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main ideas and details
Commas : Identify commas used to separate items in a list
